data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 20433, Version Hash: 33a41df668e13192dbcefe96e0d4bfddfa133a5d
data.actual_result: The Green Dot never shows up
data.expected_result: The PTT Priority Green Dot should appear
data.short_description: [Priority PTT] Collapsing the Voice Channel list with the Voice Channel you're in hides the Green Dot
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable the Priority PTT features - Jump in a Voice Channel -Switch yourself to PTT - get someone else or a Music Bot into the Channel - Collapse the Channel List with that Voice Channel - Trigger PTT Priority
